ensemble.name: String Trio
ensemble.instrument: Range: G3 to E7. Double stops possible, maximum 2 notes simultaneously.
Range: C3 to A6. Double stops possible.
Range: C2 to G5. Two simultaneous notes realistic.

ensemble.name: Woodwind Quintet
ensemble.instrument: Range: C4 to D7. Monophonic only.
Range: Bb3 to A6. Monophonic only.
Range: E3 to C7. Monophonic only.
Range: Bb1 to E5. Monophonic only.
Range: F2 to C6. Monophonic only.

ensemble.name: Clarinet and Piano
ensemble.instrument: Range: E3 to C7. Monophonic only.
Range: A0 to C8. Up to 10 notes simultaneously (all fingers).

ensemble.name: Flute and Piano
ensemble.instrument: Range: C4 to D7. Monophonic only.
Range: A0 to C8. Up to 10 notes simultaneously.

ensemble.name: Violin and Piano
ensemble.instrument: Range: G3 to E7. Double stops possible.
Range: A0 to C8. Up to 10 notes simultaneously.

ensemble.name: Piano Solo
ensemble.instrument: Range: A0 to C8. Up to 10 notes simultaneously playable.

ensemble.name: Harp Solo
ensemble.instrument: Range: C1 to G7. Realistically up to 6 notes simultaneously (depending on technique).
